note.p: German schoolteacher. Born in Schurgast, Kreis Falkenberg, in Upper Silesia (now Skorogoszcz, Poland). Studied philology and history at the universities of Breslau (now Wrocław, Poland), Berlin, and Halle. Taught at the gymnasium at Görlitz in 1888.
Correspondence vol. 30, postcard from Max Steffen, 12 February 1882
